abstract: Randy Pausch, a Carnegie Mellon University professor who is dying of pancreatic cancer, used to dream of becoming a Disney “Imagineer,” or creative developer. This week he can be certain that he is a part of the Walt Disney Co. family.
lead_paragraph: Randy Pausch, a Carnegie Mellon University professor who is dying of pancreatic cancer, used to dream of becoming a Disney “Imagineer,” or creative developer. This week he can be certain that he is a part of the Walt Disney Co. family.

headline.main: Promoting (And Profiting From) a Poignant Story
